schema:creator: Bayley, Jenny
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ What if our memories were a field of sunflowers with the faces capturing and replaying the moments? This is a time of isolation - living in quarantine bubbles of socially isolating together and being mindful of our personal space bubbles. This is a time for rediscovering a love for baking reconnecting/remoting  
 __Participant age:__  Adult  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Drawing or Painting
schema:name: A Field of Memories
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
